entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a warning system mentioned in the text. It is described as '21' which suggests it may be some kind of code or identifier.

entities.name: mrs mason
entities.description: Mrs Mason is a character who screams and runs from the house due to being afraid of birds. She is mentioned as the wife of Mr Mason.

entities.name: mr mason
entities.description: Mr Mason is a character who stays behind to talk to the Dursleys about his wife's fear of birds.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story. He receives a letter from the Ministry of Magic and is accused of using magic outside of school.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a character who is angry with Harry for using magic. He brandishes a letter and tells Harry to read it.

entities.name: the dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are a family that lives in the house where Harry stays. They are mentioned as being present when Mr Mason talks to them about his wife's fear of birds.

relationships.description: Harry lives with the Dursleys, as mentioned in the text.
Mr Mason is married to Mrs Mason, as mentioned in the text when he talks about her fear of birds.
